name: Data Engineer
description:
ToYou is a leading, super-app in Saudi Arabia. We deliver just about anything: food delivery from restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies, and many other stores and merchants and the application is continuously evolving. At ToYou we aim to provide a great experience to our users by connecting them with thousands of merchants across Saudi Arabia.

At ToYou we take great pride in our diverse team. With their different backgrounds, experiences, and visions, they are the key factor to our success, so if you are interested in joining a team with great minds and talents, ToYou is the right place for you.

ToYou is looking for Data Engineer. We would like to see a person who is passionate about their job, looking forward to new challenges and able to start contributing from day one. From our side, we offer a variety of professional growth opportunities, competitive package and a friendly professional team. If you are passionate about this role, we'd love to hear from you!

Remote work and/or relocation can be considered.

Role responsibilities:

  • Design, build and maintain our services
  • Create and maintain ETL/ELT and streaming pipelines
  • Writing efficient, reusable, reliable and scalable code
  • Support and refactor legacy code
  • Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and provide solutions
  • Assist with the overall service architecture
  • Participate in design and code reviews
  • Implement security and data protection solutions
  • Maintain and develop data quality processes

Role qualifications:

  • Work of experience of 3+ years in a similar role
  • 2+ commercial projects under the belt
  • Fluency in English
  • Knowledge and work experience with:
    Core:
    • Core Python
    • SQL
    • DWH
    • GIT
    • Raw SQL

Will be considered as an advantage:

  • High load services
  • Cloud-first architecture (AWS preferable, but not a must)
  • CI/CD (Jenkins, Terraform, CloudFormation etc)
  • Redshift
  • Spark/AWS Glue/Databricks
  • AirFlow
  • Kafka/Streaming tools
  • dbt
  • NoSQL
  • Linux
  • Faust framework
  • Understanding of integrations with BI tools
  • Tableau/Superset

What we offer:

  • An attractive remuneration package
  • Medical insurance upon completion of the probation period
  • Fruits, coffee, tea, biscuits in the office
  • Contemporary work environment
  • Flexible working scheme (hybrid model)
  • Ping pong table in the office

Interested applicants can submit their CV in English.
